page.title: 09PARK FARM
page.content: Mr.Ford owns Park Farm.On the farm he has 20 sows and 40 stores,altogether he keeps 60 pigs. This year 100 piglets were born. The farm was bought 40 years ago by Mr.Ford. He moved to this area because he liked this district and always wanted to have his own farm. Mr. Ford has some tractors and trailers and other machinrs to help him run the farm. He is a pleasant man to speak to and he has lots of work to do on the farm.There was some grain in the barn which he uses as feed.The piglets are in a shed with their mother and their father,the boar,is in another shed.He also grows some crops including oil-seed rape and potatoes.The farm is big and includes 50 fields.It is both a pig farm and crop farm.
